title: DISABLE_VEHICLE_PASSENGER_IDLE_CAMERA
content:
0x5C140555// DisableVehiclePassengerIdleCamera
void DISABLE_VEHICLE_PASSENGER_IDLE_CAMERA(BOOL state);Parameters:state: On/OffDisables the game's afk camera that starts panning around after 30 seconds of inactivity(While riding in a car as a passenger)
